name: CARBON-DIE-OUT-XIDE
description:
Another game about mining?

NO!

Shooting mercenaries! Exploding Pandas! Experimental Bio-fully-organic-semi-radioactive weapons!

 Introducing:

CARBON-DIE-OUT-XIDE

When human negligence carves the pathway to global chaos...

When coal companies dominate the landscape...

It's up to Cole Rockstein to do the right thing: propose green alternatives and subsequently get fired, forcing his hand to destroy his former employers from the inside - and turn the gards into bio-compost!

Jump! Shoot! And throw exploding panda plushies about to bring natural retribution!

When the dust of battle settles...

The war still rages within!

Disclaimer: This game is a WIP, it was created within 5 days. It relies heavily on sattire and therefore parts of it do not represent the team's view on the topic! Credits
